Sorry I havn't been posting much for the last two days. I had a huge 
project for English that I had to do. I'll post more often now though.


::Autofire/Stratus::

Autofire watches the battle being won by Megatron, pushing through 
the group of bots to get near the Decepticon commander.

"You're better than I first thought," he says, stopping near Megatron 
and looking down at all the bots around him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Err, is Speedbreaker still holding Stratus up in the air?




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Megatron smiles from the turn of events. They are his now, and 
together,
> they will conquer this world, he thinks to himself. He gets off of
> Astroblast and Drag Strip, and motion for them to follow, and he 
flies off
> the cliff, and lands in the middle of the 
Decepticons. "Motormaster, Status
> report" he blurts without emotion.
> 
> Motormaster walks towards the group. "Mighty Megatron, our ship has 
a full
> stack of Energon cubes for our disposal. Scourge, Cyclonus, 
Triggerhappy,
> and the Terrorcons and Skullgrin are now part of the Decepticon 
troops,
> loyal to you. That is Switchblade" he says, pointing to the small 
robot,
> and then pointing to the Bodicons finishes, "and those are the 
Bodicons."
> 
> Megatron bends down, and picks up his fusion cannon. While hooking 
it back
> up to his arm he starts. "Yes, I remember Cyclonus and Scourge, I 
saw you
> work through Galvatron's eyes. You were loyal to him, can I count 
on that
> kind of loyalty ?" he asks.
